title: Plant-Scoped Characteristic Hierarchy and Configuration
current_scope: Characteristics and configuration are global across the system
proposed_change: Isolate characteristic hierarchy and configuration per plant. All screens should be scoped to the selected plant. Add per-site settings for data connectivity (MQTT/OPC-UA).
reason: Enterprise deployments require multi-plant support where each plant has its own characteristic hierarchy, configuration settings, and data connectivity requirements.
requirements: Configuration screens scoped to selected plant
Plant-specific data connectivity settings (MQTT broker, OPC-UA server)
Plant selector filters all data views to selected plant
Plant-level settings page for connectivity configuration

impact.timeline: Significant - requires database schema changes and API refactoring
